001
002package com.commercetools.api.models.product;
003
004import java.time.LocalDate;
005import java.time.LocalTime;
006import java.time.ZonedDateTime;
007import java.util.List;
008import java.util.Map;
009
010import javax.annotation.Nullable;
011
012import com.commercetools.api.models.MapAccessor;
013import com.commercetools.api.models.common.LocalizedString;
014import com.commercetools.api.models.common.Reference;
015import com.commercetools.api.models.common.TypedMoney;
016import com.commercetools.api.models.product_type.AttributeLocalizedEnumValue;
017import com.commercetools.api.models.product_type.AttributePlainEnumValue;
018
019public class AttributesAccessor extends MapAccessor<Attribute> {
020
021    public AttributesAccessor(Map<String, Attribute> attributes) {
022        super(attributes);
023    }
024
025    public static AttributesAccessor of(ProductVariant variant) {
026        return new AttributesAccessor(AttributeAccessor.asMap(variant));
027    }
028
029    public static AttributesAccessor of(Map<String, Attribute> attributes) {
030        return new AttributesAccessor(attributes);
031    }
032
033    @Nullable
034    public LocalDate asDate(final String key) {
035        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asDate);
036    }
037
038    @Nullable
039    public LocalTime asTime(final String key) {
040        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asTime);
041    }
042
043    @Nullable
044    public ZonedDateTime asDateTime(final String key) {
045        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asDateTime);
046    }
047
048    @Nullable
049    public List<LocalDate> asSetDate(final String key) {
050        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asSetDate);
051    }
052
053    @Nullable
054    public List<LocalTime> asSetTime(final String key) {
055        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asSetTime);
056    }
057
058    @Nullable
059    public List<ZonedDateTime> asSetDateTime(final String key) {
060        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asSetDateTime);
061    }
062
063    @Nullable
064    public String asString(final String key) {
065        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asString);
066    }
067
068    @Nullable
069    public Boolean asBoolean(final String key) {
070        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asBoolean);
071    }
072
073    @Nullable
074    public Double asDouble(final String key) {
075        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asDouble);
076    }
077
078    @Nullable
079    public LocalizedString asLocalizedString(final String key) {
080        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asLocalizedString);
081    }
082
083    @Nullable
084    public AttributePlainEnumValue asEnum(final String key) {
085        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asEnum);
086    }
087
088    @Nullable
089    public AttributeLocalizedEnumValue asLocalizedEnum(final String key) {
090        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asLocalizedEnum);
091    }
092
093    @Nullable
094    public Long asLong(final String key) {
095        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asLong);
096    }
097
098    @Nullable
099    public Reference asReference(final String key) {
100        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asReference);
101    }
102
103    @Nullable
104    public TypedMoney asMoney(final String key) {
105        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asMoney);
106    }
107
108    @Nullable
109    public List<String> asSetString(final String key) {
110        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asSetString);
111    }
112
113    @Nullable
114    public List<Boolean> asSetBoolean(final String key) {
115        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asSetBoolean);
116    }
117
118    @Nullable
119    public List<Double> asSetDouble(final String key) {
120        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asSetDouble);
121    }
122
123    @Nullable
124    public List<LocalizedString> asSetLocalizedString(final String key) {
125        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asSetLocalizedString);
126    }
127
128    @Nullable
129    public List<AttributePlainEnumValue> asSetEnum(final String key) {
130        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asSetEnum);
131    }
132
133    @Nullable
134    public List<AttributeLocalizedEnumValue> asSetLocalizedEnum(final String key) {
135        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asSetLocalizedEnum);
136    }
137
138    @Nullable
139    public List<Long> asSetLong(final String key) {
140        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asSetLong);
141    }
142
143    @Nullable
144    public List<Reference> asSetReference(final String key) {
145        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asSetReference);
146    }
147
148    @Nullable
149    public List<TypedMoney> asSetMoney(final String key) {
150        return get(key, AttributeAccessor::asSetMoney);
151    }
152}
